name: yourefugedonate
0:
”Alexa open you refuge”
”Alexa ask you refuge how does you refuge help refugees”
”Alexa ask you refuge what does you refuge do”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: you refuge
Developer Terms of Use
des: Yourefuge is a non-profit startup founded by students at the University of California, Berkeley. This Alexa app is designed to help the general population become more aware of the plight of refugees. We also seek support from the general population as we build our technical architecture and start piloting our products on-the-ground.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
